    Package Description
    org.apache.hc.core5.http.impl.nio  
    org.apache.hc.core5.http.pool.io
    Default implementations of client side connection pools for synchronous, blocking communication.
    org.apache.hc.core5.http.pool.nio
    Default implementations of client side connection pools for synchronous, blocking communication.
    org.apache.hc.core5.pool.io
    Client side connection pools APIs for synchronous, blocking communication.
    org.apache.hc.core5.pool.nio
    Client side connection pools APIs for asynchronous, event driven communication.

      Classes in org.apache.hc.core5.http.pool.io that implement ConnPool 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BasicConnPool
      A very basic ConnPool implementation that represents a pool of blocking HttpClientConnection connections identified by an HttpHost instance.

    • Uses of ConnPool in org.apache.hc.core5.http.pool.nio

      Classes in org.apache.hc.core5.http.pool.nio that implement ConnPool 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BasicNIOConnPool
      A very basic ConnPool implementation that represents a pool of non-blocking NHttpClientConnection connections identified by an HttpHost instance.
